text:
Phyllis Jeanne Somerville (December 12, 1943 – July 16, 2020) was an American actress. She was best known for her roles in "Little Children" (2006), "The Curious Case of Benjamin Button" (2008), "Surviving Family" (2012), "The Big C" (2010–2013), and "Outsiders" (2016–2017).
Somerville died on July 16, 2020 in New York City, aged 76.

annotations.surface_form: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
